replies.body:
Pretty nice overal

I used to make fun of your old montage which you recorded with your phone and it had one combo on someone, lol
Now you improving as a player pretty quickly and its nice to see, i feel like you are trying to be nice too much but i cant tell realy because some people its their personality and if youre one of these its a gift from god really.

Try watching videos of other experienced players and the way they play. Try watching raw footages and learn from the communication, being a good player is really not solely about pvp skills like most players think, in fact, its one of the less important factors in being a good/smart/valuable player.

replies.body:
One of my best buds on apollo in here
You are very funny at times and i love having laughs with you, you are also very fun to play with even not in minecraft
You are smart when you need to, but unfortunately to be completely honest with you i dont think you lead well. You have got everything like charisma and organizing players, but when leading you sometimes do really non sense things like constantly pushing at koth and tdm based gamemodes, and in some other in general. you need to know when to push, and what you do is basically push whenever we get a kill but some of us may be in uncomfortable positions / low health, and i believe this is a major reason so our recent losses in koth, other than our cancer comm as a whole. and no, dont take this as an offense, im going hard on you cause youre a close friend and id love if you took that as feedback to improve. <3


Its lower than my iq, should be around 3-4

not enough rating loL!

im the first white kid to be a terrorist i think

You are very funny at times and i love having laughs with you, you are also very fun to play with even not in minecraft

replies.body:
Best friend on this server

Every time i remind myself you are 12 years old its like impossible i didnt believe you at first. You are mature when needed most of the time but sometimes you need to be mature and you dont do it, instead you go "guys u take this too seriously" mode.

You probably dont know this cause you are younger than me and ive gone through this before you, but we are literally the same person. everything you do i used to do, the way you act i used to act before i mentally grew up, and i basically used to be exactly like you (immature sometimes).
There will be that time ryan when you realise you need to be more mature and you will, like me. im an immature fag most of the time but i do become mature when needed like in scrims, where you should as well. but for the mean time literally stay as you are

I love you so much as a friend i always want to speak to you and its not like youre not on like other people youre always on and i alwas enjoy speaking to you, tbh when i got bad days in school u chill me and make me feel better
Even when i get triggered at you i still love u ryan <3

jesus what i typed just makes me feel so fucking gay its unbelievable, makes us sound married lmao

Cool guy, very nice in voice chat, i love your voice for some reason. you used to be quite annoying and toxic, you also made stupid decisions and pointless arguements which i believe led to your demotion, so learn from it.
Good as a player and improving slowly, its good that you had the balls to create a team and lead it, very good first experience as competitive.

Headset: Niether, but if between them then probably Corsair

Youre welcome

One of my best friends too, i love you and your beaner shit. you can be annoying as fuck sometimes, but other times i fucking love you so much. you are one of the funniest people for me for some reason, i very much enjoy talking to you, youre my favorite beaner and i love you.
You are not very good in defending recently i feel you kinda lost it, you dont seem to also play very smart with game sense unfortunately. max you really need to start listening to strats and following directions imo, you could be a very good player.
Other than this your pvp is pretty good and yeah you suck at rocket league L

Very nice beaner with tasty embananas. youre funny and nice and i hope we talk more :)

Rock, EDM

Right now its Fall Out Boy

YES

Canada, US, Britain

what? uhh like 4? idk lmao

potatos and shintzel

ice crean

I think im an immature person most of the time, but i am very mature when needed. i consider myself quite smart and i think im good when it comes to creativity, creation, and stuff like that in general. i think i can be funny at occasions too, but very annoying and dick to some people and toxic in general, i work on improving that but sometimes i just dont care enough to stop being toxic.

I have not played enough with you to give you enough feedback, but from what i have seen you need to communicate a little more and clearly in general, not do stupid stuff when needing to be serious (scrim etc) and youre pretty decent in the pvps already so das cool

I need to rage a little less and stay calm. i already was perfectly fine in doing so but since my team hadnt scrimmed in ages i forgot how do comm well and im working on that now. other than this i believe my skill is good enough in block and sword stuff, but working more on bow wouldnt hurt since i dont excell on this.

Sometimes yes, sometimes no

thanks brother ;)

replies.body:
Fortissimus

Javipepe :D he flew to israel earlier this year or end of 2016 not sure and we met up, sat in a cafe together and had some fun. we even uploaded  apicture to the show yourself to the world thread u can see that there if ur interested.

I really have lots,  i really cant decide. play-wise probably breaking the mon vs. bad company that classic shit made my year. fun-wise i had a shit ton so i rly cant tell

Im gonna start off with the bad cause i want to for some reason. youre extremely two faced in my opinion, so many occasions ive seen you agree to a person on a topic and then agree to another person on the opposing side on the same topic. you are geneally two faced a lot but i guess and really hope its simply cause you are a nice person and you want to be nice to everyone. its cool, but giving your opinion on things wont hurt. and dont take this as an offense, youre a nice person and this is just a honest opinion post so take it easy
on the other hand youre a nice, enjoyable and quite funny person to speak to and you are recently improving lots as a player. youve got good pvp skills so use them wisely along with game sense.

Fortissimus

Javipepe :D he flew to israel earlier this year or end of 2016 not sure and we met up, sat in a cafe together and had some fun. we even uploaded  apicture to the show yourself to the world thread u can see that there if ur interested.

I really have lots,  i really cant decide. play-wise probably breaking the mon vs. bad company that classic shit made my year. fun-wise i had a shit ton so i rly cant tell

Im gonna start off with the bad cause i want to for some reason. youre extremely two faced in my opinion, so many occasions ive seen you agree to a person on a topic and then agree to another person on the opposing side on the same topic. you are geneally two faced a lot but i guess and really hope its simply cause you are a nice person and you want to be nice to everyone. its cool, but giving your opinion on things wont hurt. and dont take this as an offense, youre a nice person and this is just a honest opinion post so take it easy
on the other hand youre a nice, enjoyable and quite funny person to speak to and you are recently improving lots as a player. youve got good pvp skills so use them wisely along with game sense.

replies.body:
Youre probably one of the only spanish people that make me see that community in a good light. unfortunately there are many toxic spanish annoying people but on the other hand there are so many nice people, and one of them is fortunately you. you are very smart, you stand on your opinion quite well, and its fun talking to you. you never ever suck up to anyone and always say what you think, and i really appreciate that. im happy that were friends and i enjoy the uhcs we do sometime. unfortunately i dont get to see you that much cause of timezones, but summer holidays are close (for me at least) so ill hope we would talk more ;)

shabat shalom

Really funny guy in general i will start off with that. i always used to read the posts on the ocn forums and people got annoyed from you constantly meming but i liked it and it was very funny. your memes are good and you are also a good player both with sword and rod.
You can be annoying at times, from what ive seen (i havent spoken to you too much). As for that zaoki shit in the tournament you and your team especially handled it very shitly in my opinion, by calling everyone ignorant instead of actually explaining what happened and it just was a no brainer. Also, you say how much you dont care about avicus and you dont want to waste your time on this however i always see you play, on alts and on your main too, so i dont understand that but thats just it i guess.
Other than this i spoke to you over voice a few times and your voice is veryyy calming and cool makes me feel calm lol.

Cool guy, really improved lots as a player recently. i havent talked to you too much but yeah ive scrimmed with/against you few times and you seem nice as a person

Very good team. has a good roster, and the way they play is very aggressive which is a good strategy if you know how to do it well. Some of them are really toxic fags that really ruin the reputation for the rest of the team. I know most of the people in that team and i could say im pretty good bud with most of them except a few. They have potential to become a really really good team imo, just wish as i said some of them were less retarded

replies.body:
I dont think i have ever talked to you, so i cant really say anything. judging by your name and the way u talk in chat i guess ur a pretty memelike person and its nice cause i am too :)

Since its an opinions question i expect you to know im honest in my response - im almost quite certainly sure you used to cheat very blatantly when your name was something like "dehydrenation" or something like that. I have recorded a hack evidence of you back then and i was told it was not enough for a ban. You were sketchy asf in a few scrims few months back and i was sure you hacked and i still am (for that day). however nowadays you joined some other team and we scrimmed recently lots of times and you don't seem to be cheaty at all, so i guess that if you did hack back then you're lucky that you didn't get banned so i'd suggest to take this as a lesson. From the recent scrims you're a pretty decent player at melee and bow but you solo push quite a lot, and i'd suggest to try to use game-sense and coordinate team pushes

replies.body:
Very cool guy
I dont understand what are you saying sometimes tbh and i get really confused. you used to tryhard so bad when you were in cronus, you didnt ever listen to feedback people gave you and got really mad instead. me and some other people used to use you as a term to a useless defense cause you always made useless very time consuming defenses that were not worth the time.
On the bright side you dont do it now-adays. your defenses have gone a huge way through-out your experience as a player and its so fun to see someone developing into a better player. your defenses are still yet to improve more, but its a lot better. as a pvper ur good too and as a person i enjoy talking to you in ts most of the time, your comms are also very chill :)

- Remy
- Robin or Jive

replies.body:
One of best friends in this server. i love almost every bit about you. ill start off with that i dont like cause fuck you XDD@! I dont like how sometimes you are the guy to go with the flow if you get me. i meant that you sometimes agree with others when you shouldnt do that imo. i can see that you are going against your own opinion or simply agreeing with the bigger group. i think you are really that badass to go against everybody else cause you have a big opinion and skill to convince, so thats just a tip from me to really go with what you think. other than this youre hilarious most of the times and i love speaking to you in teamspeak, we used to have so much memories together and i still keep them deep in my jewish heart as you say, and i hope we can talk more now that its summer.
One of the best melee players in the pvp community as far as i know, and i dont say this about everyone so really take that as a compliment. i can think of anyone in ocn or this server that you have completely destroyed i can remember. only thing is that i always felt your pvp skill and game in general is very heavily affected by the mentality in the match or the player your fightinign against - confidence basically. ive seen numoerous times you go to sky and get rekt by a good player cause you are just kind of frightened to fight him i cant rly explain it and then when you die you just say like uhhhh hes good. you must be more confident cause honestly youre a very very good pvp mine craft man. if you are going to take pvp seriously again i will be very happy youre a huge asset to our team i love you.

replies.body:
I have never said i hate this server, show me where i said that. In fact:
- I was staff on this server 4 times
- I have built a lobby, 24 maps and still building maps for this server all the time
- I make videos that feature content on this server and they get a decent amount of 400+ views each.

This server has done so much to me - taught me english from ground up, ive had so much fun times and memories on this server. ive earnt lots of good friends ill keep in contact with for a long time

I think you should ask yourself this question to be honest lol

One of best friends in this server. i love almost every bit about you. ill start off with that i dont like cause fuck you XDD@! I dont like how sometimes you are the guy to go with the flow if you get me. i meant that you sometimes agree with others when you shouldnt do that imo. i can see that you are going against your own opinion or simply agreeing with the bigger group. i think you are really that badass to go against everybody else cause you have a big opinion and skill to convince, so thats just a tip from me to really go with what you think. other than this youre hilarious most of the times and i love speaking to you in teamspeak, we used to have so much memories together and i still keep them deep in my jewish heart as you say, and i hope we can talk more now that its summer.
One of the best melee players in the pvp community as far as i know, and i dont say this about everyone so really take that as a compliment. i can think of anyone in ocn or this server that you have completely destroyed i can remember. only thing is that i always felt your pvp skill and game in general is very heavily affected by the mentality in the match or the player your fightinign against - confidence basically. ive seen numoerous times you go to sky and get rekt by a good player cause you are just kind of frightened to fight him i cant rly explain it and then when you die you just say like uhhhh hes good. you must be more confident cause honestly youre a very very good pvp mine craft man. if you are going to take pvp seriously again i will be very happy youre a huge asset to our team i love you.

replies.body:
Cool mod. youve been a mod for so long now however i dont think you deserve any higher position i guess you are great exactly where you are, keep doing your thing
Youre very annoying to me personally for some reason, ive never disliked you until you started being a cunt and literally commenting on everything i say on avicus discord in a negative way. you constantly try to start arguements with me on the discord by simply replying with retarded, useless replies that are, in an obvious way, to flame. 

If you meant by "here" to Avicus - I love this server and i always did. as much as i get triggered on this sometimes, i appreciate all its done for me. it earned me so many friends, got me open minded and creative, taught me english from ground up, and so much other things. i used to play public a lot, however now im still "here" because i enjoy the competitive scene on this game and i wish it would grow. i always build lots of maps for this server and i enjoy it, can call it another thing that's keeping me here, and lastly - my youtube channel

Apollo and many others i cba to list are good friends, but the very very closest friends are probably peachy, sparks, seuth, ryan and ghost at the moment. all the others are great friends too but just not as close as the ones i listed

- Becoming Jr Mod LOL
- Becoming Builder
- Becoming Map dev at one point
- and that shit https://youtu.be/CMjF-MdLa4g?t=9m44s
